title: Rihanna reveals dream wedding dress designer as she gushes about billionaire boyfriend Hassan Jameel
text:
Rihanna may be keeping fans in excruciating anticipation for her long-awaited next album, but she recently gave a rare interview for the cover of Vogue.

And the Fenty founder may have wedding bells in her future, as she discussed what she has in mind for the potential big day.

RiRi revealed to iconic editor Anna Wintour which designer she has in mind for a wedding dress collaboration.

Cover girl: Rihanna may be keeping fans in excruciating anticipation for her long-awaited next album, but she recently gave a rare interview for the cover of Vogue

She said during the video series Go Ask Anna: 'It would probably be a collaboration between myself and [John] Galliano, of course.'

The 31-year-old has been close to the British fashion designer since early in her career.

Rihanna is also releasing a coffee table book later this month, featuring 1,000 images of her most iconic looks.

Her risque eye for fashion, which has come to fruition with Fenty, blended with Galliano's coveted couture should make for an interesting bridal look.

Fashion friends: The 31-year-old has been close to the British fashion designer since early in her career

Risque bride: Her risque eye for fashion, which has come to fruition with Fenty, blended with Galliano's coveted couture should make for an interesting bridal look

Look book: Rihanna is also releasing a coffee table book later this month, featuring 1,000 images of her most iconic looks

As for a potential groom, Rihanna also confirmed her relationship with Saudi billionaire Hassan Jameel.

Although their romance has remained mostly private, the couple has been linked together since 2017.

She gushed during the interview: 'Yeah, I'm dating. I'm actually in an exclusive relationship for quite some time, and it's going really well, so I'm happy.'

And when asked if she wants children, the Love on the Brain artist responded, 'without a doubt.'

But during Go Ask Anna, she explained: 'I don't think about stuff like that. I don't know, God's plan. But I look forward to all the pregnancy rumors after this interview.'
